name: Beef Stroganoff
linkName: 20 of the BEST Things to Make in the Instant Pot - What I ALWAYS Make
notes: Modified original recipe to reduce the amount of egg noodles by half and doubled the amount of mushrooms. I also added a bit of cream cheese as well. The best way to reheat leftovers is to put the servings into the Instant Pot, add 1 cup of beef broth and pressure cook 4 minutes. Quick release. If it is too watery add 1 tablespoon of flour. Also add a bit more sour cream. Tastes just as yummy.

instructions.description: Layer the bottom of the liner with olive oil spray
Add stew meat, 1 package that covers the bottom (0.89 lbs to 1 lb)
Turn on saute mode
Add garlic salt, salt and pepper
Sear the meat by stirring it around for about 2-3 minutes
Add 1/2 to a whole chopped onion
Add 1/2 teaspoon of minced garlic or one garlic clove
Add 1-2 8oz packages of sliced mushrooms (e.g. Kroger Baby Bella, 1 package 8oz)
Mix all contents and saute for a few minutes
Add 2 tablespoons of tapioca flour (dissolved in 1 tbsp of water first) and mix to thicken sauce
Add 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire Sauce
Add 3 cups of Beef Broth
Turn off saute
Pressure Cook: 12 minutes
Quick Release
Add about 50% (8 oz (weight)) of a 16 oz package of egg noodles and stir. Add extra beef broth if necessary if too dry.
Pressure Cook: 4 minutes
Quick Release
Turn on saute mode
Add 1 cup of sour cream and mix
Optional: add a bit of cream cheese for extra flavor
Add extra flour if too watery or add a bit more broth if too dry
